Since this is the first segment and there is no indication of any jumps yet, we cannot determine the number of successful jumps he makes before falling. Earlier, at [0-1], the man was preparing to jump, and there was no indication of any jumps yet. The dense caption confirms that he made two successful jumps before failing on the third.
